plot: A disgraced pilot determines to regain the respect of both his son, now a test pilot for the Army, and the men he once flew with.
title: Flight Lieutenant
plot_es: A disgraced pilot determines to regain the respect of both his son, now a test pilot for the Army, and the men he once flew with.
plot_en: A disgraced pilot determines to regain the respect of both his son, now a test pilot for the Army, and the men he once flew with.
